name: Gnome VS Ghosts
description:
Gnomes VS Ghosts

"Gnome VS Ghosts" is an action-packed game where you play as a brave gnome tasked with defending your precious garden from waves of mischievous ghosts. Armed with your pointy hat, you must protect your plants and fend off the spectral invaders. During the day you buy upgrades and fend off  relentless waves during the night.

Can you defend your garden and save the day?

Play "Gnome VS Ghosts" to find out!

Graphics:  Juozas Pelakauskas, Malou De Paepe, Koen Berkvens

Programming: Reï Messely, Hovo Hakobyan

Sound: Patrick-Raul Babinsky, Zain Al Rubaie

Splash Art: https://twitter.com/greenajd?t=UFZV-bg0KMMgn9Bmj9yrdQ&s=09
